TopicTitle: How do I get KSP on Chromebook(I couldn't find another category to put this in)

Articles.Content: How do I get KSP on chromebook? I just wanna know

ChromeOS and Android are unsupported.  The Android app SimpleRockets might be the best you can do (if it will run on a Chromebook; I think it would).  It is great for what it is however.  Well designed,  but is short one dimension compared to KSP though
